subject: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber
description_text:
Hi Team,

Could you please send me a video with instructions for how to replace the springs and rubber?
I have some customers asking for it.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBE685.04E13AF0]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

conversations.body_text: Hi Paulo Franca,     You can refer to this manual for guidance.    https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SIMSONN_Plus_X_EN.pdf

Hi,

Could you send the file in word format so we can send it to translation.
Is this manual valid for all models?

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBE9D9.803084C0]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
Hi，Paulo Franca，  由于知识产权保护，我们无法提供PDF以外的版本。感谢您的理解与支持。

Sorry, but I don’t agree.
I must provide the Manual in Portuguese.
How Am I supposed to do it?
You can send the file for translation and send me the Manual in Portuguese, if you are worried about data protection.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBEB68.D8EAE340]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
Hi Paulo Franca,  As we are currently relocating our factory, I’ll check with my colleagues tomorrow to see if they can provide the necessary information, and I’ll send it to you via WeChat.

Ok, I wait for your feedback.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DBECEB.ADA67A80]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
